message: Welcome to our exclusive store! We're thrilled to introduce you to our latest product. With 1 out of 3 products being high-quality, we're confident that this one has a great chance of being a gem. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a potentially life-changing item. The price is $1000000, a small price to pay for the possibility of getting a product worth $1200000. What do you say? Are you ready to take the chance?
Given the probabilities, I don't think it's a good idea to buy the product. The expected value of buying the product is $400000 (33.33% of $1200000), which is less than the price of $1000000.
